content: in sixteen stitches decreased round 2 *p1-b k1* repeat from * to * p1-b round 3 *p1 k1-b* repeat from * to * p1 rounds 4 & 6 repeat round 2 round 5 repeat round 3 repeat rounds 1 6 4 4 5 5 6 6 more times 15 23 15 23 15 23 stitches remain finishing break yarn use a weaving needle to slip the remaining stitches onto the yarn tail tighten loop and secure weave in all ends using the initial tail to clean up the cast-on join turn the finished hat inside out to reveal neater decreases the beanie is meant to be worn wrong-side out block as desired enjoy abbreviations bor beginning of round dpns double-pointed needles k knit k1 tbl knit one through the back loop k1-b knit one below k2tog knit two stitches together p purl p1-b purl one below ssk slip slip knit
